name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The New York Times Headlines New Tab

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keep up with the headlines in your new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A fast, elegant interface for you to stay up to date with the top headlines from The New York Times (not affiliated). Non-NYT subscribers can also read full-length articles.

Features
-   Each new tab page displays a random headline
-   History list keeps track of recently loaded articles
-   Reading list lets you save articles for later
-   Choose between 24 different news categories
-   Light/Dark mode!
